chapter.title: The Consent Of The Governed. [ 5-8 pp ]

simplesect.para: What leadership means when you have no control over people you've never met :-). A summing up of which techniques work in this environment and which don't, and a list of the principles by which one's actions should appear to be governed. (The phrasing is deliberate, apologies to Niccolo Machiavelli.)
